title: Kka being completely reliant on Isolation is a terrible idea.
body:
I can't even enjoy Kha anymore with the shift of the meta. It's near god impossible to get isolation with tanks.

Rip kha 2015.

replies.body:
I don't think the idea of him being reliant on isolation is bad.. I think the Area of space needed between the 2 champs is too high now.. When they nerfed him they went HARD. They took away the %hp.. the range got increased, minions and turrets count now too...

If they made the AoE smaller I think it could help quite a bit.

I remember that day; still have footage of the balance changes.

gg peacock op

Turrets counting for Isolation is understandable, but minions? That was just dumb. His leap deals almost no damage, his W deals almost no damage, and his Q deals ALL the damage, except when there is someone around. They need to take away a bit of Q's damage, reduce the isolation range, and maybe let his W proc passive again or buff his leaps damage.

The problem when they nerfed Kha into mediocrity is that they fucked the range /and/ the damage of his isolation.


He needed a nerf to one or the other, not both.
My only gripe is that minions count as "nearby allies"
They have the isolation range of a peanut though.

They needa reduce the isolation range and then they needa give him something to make him stronger than other champs when someone is isolated. Right now his burst is weakest and is executed the slowest among all assassin type champions, not to mention it costs mana and is melee AND *requires* isolation.

Whereas this {{champion:7}} is allowed to bypass all aforementioned weaknesses, not that that's a problem since a few others do too but if that's the assassin standard then all assassins should be brought to it.

I'm not saying make him even more isolation based, I'm just saying he should EXCEL at isolation based assassinations far more than any other assassin who has it as an option and not a requirement like he does.

Proposal: Bonus movespeed towards Isolated targets/Bonus movespeed towards Isolated targets *while unseen.*

Also Evolved Ult should add a new effect to his passive that inflicts reduced sight range on the target and makes all Q's apply the isolation bonus for the duration.

{{champion:121}}  "Taste their fear."

All suggestions ofcourse.

He does need something from evolving his R other than a pimp'd exoskeleton for more spookin'. You could possibly add a small MR shred to his AAs after coming out of stealth that would help to increase his passive damage late game. Other than that I have no original ideas.

Nah it's a good suggestion for discussion purposes. Honestly I'd like to see the return of mid-flight W casts but have them only be able to be done in a short timeframe upon leaping and landing instead of the whole thing. Would majorly help him put out his burst combo.

On-hit MR shred? Idk man. But I feel like that passive has room to be stronger than it currently is and that's definitely one way you could go about it.

Removing the 50% damage reduction on his evolved ultimate was a reasonable call, but everything after was just absurd. I find it amusing they nerfed Kha's Q damage for bringing too much burst despite front-loading all of his damage on that ability, then when players began leveling W first for poke damage, you know, *adapting* to the changes, they nerfed that too.

I know. but he's not as awful as you make him out to be. just because he got nerfed from OP as crap to where he is right now doesnt mean he's bad. you just have to play him correctly around his kit's functionality. You are still an assassin and still need kills to snowball into late. Abuse his passive bonus damage with the brushes. Force an opponent away from minions to ensure isolated q
idk how many fb's i got because of how absurd his damage can be at level 1 when you zone properly and trade properly with your passive procs.

Maybe a tad over exaggerated, but people think of kha as a single champion, not what he does for his team, not what the team does for him.  this is the problem with complaints, there are so many factors! and personally if your trying to get isolation, you'd be dam stupid to go in by yourself. but kha is in a good area right now, and giving him more ways to access that massive power (with like 300 ad you can nuke a carry 2/3 health pretty easily.)

In my opinion his weaknesess ofset his strenght, he's relies on isolation way way too much i think this should not be the case. He should moderate dmg in normal condition and high in isolation not super low to super high. As it now bot is pretty much ungankable because without isolation you pretty much tickle, so my idea would we to increase q dmg in normal condition and decrease in isolation.

They should make a way to force isolation then.
